original_text: And Haman recounted to them the splendor of his riches, the number of his sons, all the promotions with which the king had honored him, and how he had advanced him above the officials and the servants of the king.
korean_text: 자기의 큰 영광과 자녀가 많은 것과 왕이 자기를 들어 왕의 모든 지방관이나 신하들보다 높인 것을 다 말하고

sentences.original_text: all the promotions with which the king had honored him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 자기를 높여 주신 모든 영예를

sentences.original_text: and how he had advanced him above the officials and the servants of the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기를 왕의 모든 관원과 신하보다 높였는지를
